scripts.dev: concurrently -n "KERNEL,ADMIN,PARTNER,CLIENT,WEB" -c "blue,magenta,cyan,green,yellow" "yarn dev:kernel" "yarn dev:admin" "yarn dev:partner" "yarn dev:client" "yarn dev:web"
scripts.install:all: cd kernel && yarn install && cd ../admin && yarn install && cd ../partner && yarn install && cd ../client && yarn install && cd ../web && yarn install
